long_description: This Thule Snowcat Carrier is a dedicated carrier for skis and snowboards attaches to a wide range of vehicles with factory-installed side rails. Attaches to most vehicles with factory-installed side rails-no crossbars needed (see Fit Guide). Transports up to 6 pairs of skis or 4 snowboards. Rubber arms grib and hold skis and snowboards without scratching surfaces. Easy-to-install with telescoping design that adjusts to the width of the vehicle. Locks included.
short_description: This Thule Snowcat Carrier is a dedicated carrier for skis and snowboards attaches to a wide range of vehicles with factory-installed side rails.
